Description: A series of fragments from the funerary papyrus of a man named Hornefer with vignettes and text in hieratic from the Book of the Dead.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: William John Bankes
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (112304) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/112304)
